languages.text: "Те, кого я собрала на просторах Прорвы: имперцы, угодившие в эту юдоль страданий и отчаяния. Их обрекли на страдания на потеху врагов Человечества, но зря твари думали, что мы смиримся с этой участью! Я делю с ними мою веру в будущее — будущее, которое мы завоюем сами, с именем Его на устах!"

traits.locale_text: "Те, кого я собрала на просторах Прорвы: имперцы, угодившие в эту юдоль страданий и отчаяния. Их обрекли на страдания на потеху врагов Человечества, но зря твари думали, что мы смиримся с этой участью! Я делю с ними мою веру в будущее — будущее, которое мы завоюем сами, с именем Его на устах!"

languages.text: "I found them, subjects of the Imperium who were taken to this den of misery and despair, scattered across this vast Chasm. They were condemned to suffer for the amusement of enemies of Humanity, but the beasts were wrong in thinking we would simply resign ourselves to our fate! I share my faith in the future with them, the future that we will claim with His name upon our lips!"
languages.original_text: "Те, кого я собрала на просторах Прорвы: имперцы, угодившие в эту юдоль страданий и отчаяния. Их обрекли на страдания на потеху врагов Человечества, но зря твари думали, что мы смиримся с этой участью! Я делю с ними мою веру в будущее — будущее, которое мы завоюем сами, с именем Его на устах!"

They were condemned to suffer for the amusement of enemies of Humanity, but the beasts were wrong to think that we would simply resign ourselves to our fate! I share my faith in the future with them — the future that we will claim with His name on our lips!"

They were condemned to suffer for the amusement of enemies of Humanity, but the beasts were wrong in thinking we would simply resign ourselves to our fate! I share my faith in the future with them, the future that we will claim with His name upon our lips!"

languages.text: 「私はこの悲惨と絶望の巣窟に連行された帝国の臣民たちが、この広大な亀裂に散らばっているのを見つけた。彼らは人類の敵の娯楽としてひたすら苦しみを味わうことになるはずだった。だが我々が素直に運命に身を任せるなどと高をくくった獣の考えは、完全に間違っていた！私は彼らと未来への信仰を分かち合っている。私たちが主の御名を掲げて主張する未来をね！」
languages.original_text: "I found them, subjects of the Imperium who were taken to this den of misery and despair, scattered across this vast Chasm. They were condemned to suffer for the amusement of enemies of Humanity, but the beasts were wrong in thinking we would simply resign ourselves to our fate! I share my faith in the future with them, the future that we will claim with His name upon our lips!"

traits.locale_text: 「私はこの悲惨と絶望の巣窟に連行された帝国の臣民たちが、この広大な亀裂に散らばっているのを見つけた。彼らは人類の敵の娯楽としてひたすら苦しみを味わうことになるはずだった。だが我々が素直に運命に身を任せるなどと高をくくった獣の考えは、完全に間違っていた！私は彼らと未来への信仰を分かち合っている。私たちが声高に主の御名を掲げて主張する未来をね！」

languages.text: “是我找到了他们，他们都是帝国的臣民。他们散落在这片巨大的裂隙各处，被带到了这个充满痛苦与绝望的洞穴。他们要彼此厮杀，好让人类之敌取乐。那些邪恶的敌人以为我们只会屈从于命运，但他们错了！我与他们分享了我对未来的信仰，我们将颂唱帝皇的圣名，亲手创造我们的命运！”
languages.original_text: "I found them, subjects of the Imperium who were taken to this den of misery and despair, scattered across this vast Chasm. They were condemned to suffer for the amusement of enemies of Humanity, but the beasts were wrong in thinking we would simply resign ourselves to our fate! I share my faith in the future with them, the future that we will claim with His name upon our lips!"

traits.locale_text: “是我找到了他们，他们都是帝国的臣民。他们散落在这片巨大的裂隙各处，被带到了这个充满痛苦与绝望的洞穴。他们要彼此厮杀，好让人类之敌取乐。那些邪恶的敌人以为我们只会屈从于命运，但他们错了！我与他们分享了我对未来的信仰，我们将以帝皇的圣名，亲手创造我们的命运！”

languages.text: «He encontrado por toda la extensión del Abismo a súbditos del Imperium que acabaron arrastrados a este agujero miserable. Estaban condenados a sufrir para disfrute de los enemigos de la Humanidad, ¡pero las bestias se equivocaron al creer que nos resignaríamos a ese destino! Comparto con ellos mi fe en el futuro, ¡el futuro en el que lucharemos con el nombre del Emperador en nuestras bocas!».
languages.original_text: "I found them, subjects of the Imperium who were taken to this den of misery and despair, scattered across this vast Chasm. They were condemned to suffer for the amusement of enemies of Humanity, but the beasts were wrong in thinking we would simply resign ourselves to our fate! I share my faith in the future with them, the future that we will claim with His name upon our lips!"

traits.locale_text: «He encontrado por toda la extensión del Abismo a súbditos del Imperium que acabaron arrastrados a este agujero miserable. Estaban condenados a sufrir para disfrute de los enemigos de la Humanidad, ¡pero las bestias se equivocaron al creer que nos resignaríamos a ese destino! Comparto con ellos mi fe en el futuro, ¡el futuro en el que lucharemos con Su nombre en nuestros labios!».

languages.text: "Ich habe sie gefunden, Untertanen des Imperiums, die in diesen Pfuhl des Elends und der Verzweiflung gebracht wurden, über diese gewaltige Kluft zerstreut. Sie wurden dazu verdammt, für die Belustigung der Feinde der Menschheit zu leiden, doch die Monster haben sich getäuscht, wenn sie glaubten, wir würden uns einfach unserem Schicksal fügen! Ich teile meinen Glauben an die Zukunft mit ihnen, die Zukunft, die wir uns mit Seinem Namen auf den Lippen nehmen werden!"
languages.original_text: "I found them, subjects of the Imperium who were taken to this den of misery and despair, scattered across this vast Chasm. They were condemned to suffer for the amusement of enemies of Humanity, but the beasts were wrong in thinking we would simply resign ourselves to our fate! I share my faith in the future with them, the future that we will claim with His name upon our lips!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe sie gefunden, Untertanen des Imperiums, die in diesen Pfuhl des Elends und der Verzweiflung gebracht wurden, über diese gewaltige Kluft zerstreut. Sie wurden dazu verdammt, für die Belustigung der Feinde der Menschheit zu leiden, doch die Monster haben sich getäuscht, wenn sie glaubten, wir würden uns einfach unserem Schicksal fügen! Ich teile meinen Glauben an die Zukunft mit ihnen, die Zukunft, die wir uns mit seinem Namen auf den Lippen nehmen werden!"

languages.text: « Je les ai trouvés. Ce sont tous des sujets de l'Imperium qui ont été jetés aux quatre coins de cet antre de souffrance et de désespoir, condamnés à errer dans la Faille pour le divertissement des ennemis de l'humanité, mais ces monstres ont eu tort de croire que nous allions nous laisser faire ! Nous tous ici, nous partageons une foi commune en l'avenir, et cet avenir, nous le revendiquerons avec Son nom sur les lèvres ! »
languages.original_text: "I found them, subjects of the Imperium who were taken to this den of misery and despair, scattered across this vast Chasm. They were condemned to suffer for the amusement of enemies of Humanity, but the beasts were wrong in thinking we would simply resign ourselves to our fate! I share my faith in the future with them, the future that we will claim with His name upon our lips!"

traits.locale_text: « Je les ai trouvés. Ce sont tous des sujets de l'Imperium qui ont été jetés aux quatre coins de cet antre de souffrance et de désespoir, condamnés à errer dans la Faille pour le divertissement des ennemis de l'humanité, mais ces monstres ont eu tort de croire que nous allions nous laisser faire ! Nous tous ici, nous partageons une foi commune en l'avenir, et cet avenir, nous le revendiquerons avec Son nom sur les lèvres ! »

languages.text: "Bu ızdırap ve biçarelik çukuruna kaçırılıp bu geniş Yarık'ta dört bir yana saçılan İmparatorluk kullarını ben buldum. İnsanlığın düşmanları eğlensin diye ızdırap çekmeye mahkûm edilmişlerdi. Oysa kaderimize teslim olacağımızı sanan yaratıklar çok yanılıyor! Geleceğe duyduğum inancı onlarla paylaşıyorum... İmparator'un adını ana ana o geleceğe ulaşacağız!"
languages.original_text: "I found them, subjects of the Imperium who were taken to this den of misery and despair, scattered across this vast Chasm. They were condemned to suffer for the amusement of enemies of Humanity, but the beasts were wrong in thinking we would simply resign ourselves to our fate! I share my faith in the future with them, the future that we will claim with His name upon our lips!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu ızdırap ve biçarelik çukuruna kaçırılıp bu geniş Yarık'ta dört bir yana saçılmış bu İmparatorluk kullarını ben buldum. İnsanlığın düşmanları eğlensin diye ızdırap çekmeye mahkûm edilmişlerdi ancak kaderimize teslim oluvereceğimizi sanan yaratıklar yanılıyor! Geleceğe duyduğum inancı onlarla paylaşıyorum... O geleceğe İmparator'un adını ana ana ulaşacağız!"
